text: Ernst Zägel (5 March 1936 – 23 April 2020) was a German footballer who played for 1. FC Saarbrücken, and the Saarland national team as a forward. Zägel died on 23 April, 2020, aged 84.Ernst Zägel mit 84 Jahren gestorben ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Saarland B international footballers Category:1. title: Ernst Zägel
